title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - NBA Playoffs Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - NBA Playoffs Best Bets
description:
Pro gambler Simon Hunter of Action Network isn't afraid to call himself a Philadelphia 76ers fan, despite his taste for sharp bets. So we've invited on Action senior NBA writer Matt Moore and Jason Timpf of the Lakers Tonight podcast to talk all things betting in the NBA as the league turns its attention to postseason action. Together they break down the Eastern and Western Conference contenders and pretenders, and discuss who has what it takes in the first round and beyond. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
